de.ityx.contex.itag.dao

Class ConfigurationEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.contex.itag.dao.ConfigurationEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Entity
public class ConfigurationEntity
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Database entity containing all information that the ITag associates with a (master, namespace) tuple.

    Included are the following items:
    • id (database primary key) - an ID unique across all configurations in the database.
    • profile - The (master, namespace) tuple the data is associated with.
    • parameters - The model parameters and features that will be used by the training workflow to create a model. The pipeline and feature list described is also used during classification to convert a document into the form that can be processed by the classifier. (Written to the database as a serialized BLOB)
    • model - The model that will be used for the classification. After the training workflow is finished, the results are stored in this field. (Written to the database as a serialized BLOB)
    • modelStatus - The current state of the model in relation to the training data. See ModelStatus for more information.
    Not included are the set of labels and the training documents themselves as of those, usually many instances belong to a single (master, namespace) tuple. The database schemas for labels and training documents are defined in LabelEntity and TrainingDocumentEntity respectively.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
